text: ane te'one margathi bhatakavato rahisa ane khoti maneccha'o tarapha doravato rahisa. Ane te'one sikhavadisa ke janavarona kana ciri nakhe ane te'one kahisa ke allaha ta'ala'e banaveli racanamam pheraphara kari de, sambhalo! Je vyakti allahane chodi setanane potano mitra banavase tene khullu nukasana pahoncase
